metadata.name: #1 Woman in red
metadata.description:
Some time ago I found an old hard drive that had been lost for years in the garage of my house full of photographs taken by myself. I have selected some of these photographs and I have been working on them one by one with an oil and watercolor style. Then, with all the drawings and images, I created layers intertwined with each other, which vibrate in the exact time that a heartbeat lasts.

ROBENS | byrobens.eth

WebSite https://robens.io

Twitter https://twitter.com/byROBENS
